title: Gangplank's oranges outhealed me as Taric in a duel

replies.body: Not for long, friend.

> [{quoted}](name=RiotRepertoir,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EYqx7I4m,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-09-23T17:01:02.808+0000)
>
> Not for long, friend.

this post rustles my gemmies
*squish sound*
O_O

Oh gowd, this is now awkward.
*gets popcorn and waits for the awkward chain to start*

Hello? Is this the awkward chain? I got lost on my way he-

Oh. Oh no. Oh mother of gems NO o-o
yes......wait where am i 0-0 {{champion:25}}  Oh THAT RIGHT waiting for this year stun to finish :/
Now you're stuck in the awkward chain. Welcome to Hell.
Oh yes, welcome to Hell.
So hows everyones day...

Pretty good so far.
*squish sound*

No, they're just going to nerf GP heal.

(Yes I'm kidding, saying it before massive downvotes)
Lets just downvote this guy anyway
-100 downvotes...? Does that mean 100 upvotes? I'm confused.

I didn't know what to do, so I upvoted....
http://4.bp.blogspot.com/_JmpkIMgnzIE/S7Yz-BAbJaI/AAAAAAAAk8Y/EqwTSaYA6kc/s400/25+Examples+of+Confused+Animals+7.jpg
Could you give us some emerald for insight?
What were the rubies for again?

For vigor. 

( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
For sightstones that no one buys.
Gangplank Orange nerf?! Or subtle hint at Taric's rework....
I believe the later.
Taric rework already been announced. Coming soon-ish. End of year beginning of next is when it's looking at the moment.

I have only 1 wish. As i play taric. Dont make this become the next {{champion:13}} {{champion:69}} {{champion:82}} .

Pretty please?

With ruby on top?

i mained taric since S1, i swear to god if they even actually change a single skill on his kit, so not 'reworking' him like they 'reworked' ashe i will fucking explode. I have 800 euros in this game and they better not molest taric. I will have to kill everyone on the planet if they do.
Calm down there captain.

Well as a fellow Taric main. Let me know what you think of this.
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/W3TwRPWs-a-comprehensive-taric-reworkbring-the-gem-knight-back

**Note** I'm still unsure about Dazzle Might revert it back to normal as well.
I want taric to keep his heal, also his stun should never become a skillshot, hes a fucking tank not a carry. he RELIES on it.

Ya i know about the stun, was think at the time i wrote that, Taric gets no play because he has zero mechanics, lets change that. I do agree there but on the heal, right now the heal is the only thing that sucks on support taric. It simply doesn't do enough. But I'd rather them not buff that and reduce him elsewhere. So thats why I thought to rework it into his passive.

why the flying fucking hell do all champs need flashy mechanics, taric not having flashy mechanics is a good thing, it makes him original and have a calm and tanky feel about him. If riot gives him dashes and skillshots then he turns into a carry and FUCK THAT.

Ok I agreed about the stun. Or did you not see that? His heal right now is lack luster at best. It's decent if used solo but not as a support skill. The one skill shot I and changed his stun too would not give him "flashy" mechanics. The Q was a damage reflector. Jinx wants to ult low hp adc step in front kill jinx instead. Maybe thats what you were talking about as flashy but it would fit support Taric's play style. The passive I made I really like. Taric is not know for big damage so he's healing his adc little by little. You're either healing and pushing the wave or letting damage stick. Has pro's and con's. Never gave him a dash. And changed his Ult from team aura(aura's make me sick) to single target mega buff. Now that said, I agree with you that Taric needs to stay basic and not have super high mechanic level abilities. I was trying to create a little mechanical play with a skill shot though. But I also admit he should keep it. "Most reliable stun in game." Nothing I changed made him a carry. If anything it cemented his role as support.
EPIC FORESHADOWING.
I'm really glad it's you working on the Taric rework. Gives me hope you've been able to put him in a spot where he can compete against the likes of Thresh, Braum, and Leona.
http://i.imgur.com/ZujDOwD.png

pls
its legit imo. gangrape cant gives the oranges like taric can gives the gems so its k
100% true. Although if you are cycling your skill properly as Taric, your heal is up far more frequently than GP's. So you should still out heal him. Unless for some god awful reason it's AP GP.
in that case, the most likely reason he was out healed was gp had more than usual levels in oranges.
AP GP maxes oranges first right?
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hbdtzOIRh1Y
That made my day mate. Thank you.
I put that up every time anyone says something about AP GP.

>
> its legit imo. **gang**-**rape** cant gives the oranges like taric can gives the gems so its k

I just can't unsee that name.....
im sorry if i was offensive, it was meant to just be funny.
nah it wasn't offensive,just weird that the combination of gangplank and grape turns into this xD
you CLEARLY havent heard of the grapist [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SZoiJM1vlfc](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SZoiJM1vlfc)

> [{quoted}](name=StealthWarden,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EYqx7I4m,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-09-23T15:03:27.728+0000)
>
> its legit imo. gangrape cant gives the oranges like taric can gives the gems so its k

But Taric is supposed to be a supportive kind of guy, nor does he do near the amount of damage as Gangplank nor have his Q poke, so his heal should be stronger.

if i remember correctly his self heal is stronger than his targeted heal... based on what you said , they should switch those around and make the  supportive heal stronger, like soraka, and reduce his dueling power to focus on support role. In which case, you should still lose the heal battle 1v1 vs gangplank.
You're talking about a lot of 'shoulds.' this post is about the reality of what Taric is right now. Right now, with his self heal being as strong as it is, Taric should out-heal Gangplank.

Generally things on a lower the CD have weaker numbers hence why gangplank and his orange has a high CD but come with a potentially higher heal, emphasis on potentially considering his heal is based on missing health
